about_the_game:
Jumping Steve is a 2d arcade style indy casual roguelike game with lots to discover.

Control Steve and jump to stay on the crows, collect the thingys and stay alive for as long as you can to increase your score.

Complete random tasks and less random tasks like staying alive for 2 minutes to tick the boxes in your achievement list to increase the power of your log book.

Unlock power ups in classic mode or use the M.O.D machine for some randomised madness.

Its arcade style of play is perfect for taking in turns with friends.

A score board so you know whos better.

Now with a VS mode, 2 player can drop in or drop out at almost any time.

a unique indie style of its own.

Visit Camp Aign on the search for The Main Thingy and collect more Thingys.

Find items like the Upgraded shirt to improve your jumping and score or other items to do other stuff.

No tutorials, very little reading, lots of action.

Over 25 minutes of original music to discover.

Compatible with touch screen devices.

The first game ever made by Steves Games.

Created using Construct

highlighted.name: They are for taxidermy i swear

content_descriptors.notes:
Some mild swearing.
Drug items that do random effects when you pick them up. (Crack,sterroids,beer)
A gun you can shoot peoples heads off, everyone comes back to life, very cartoonish.

detailed_description:
Jumping Steve is a 2d arcade style indy casual roguelike game with lots to discover.

Control Steve and jump to stay on the crows, collect the thingys and stay alive for as long as you can to increase your score.

Complete random tasks and less random tasks like staying alive for 2 minutes to tick the boxes in your achievement list to increase the power of your log book.

Unlock power ups in classic mode or use the M.O.D machine for some randomised madness.

Its arcade style of play is perfect for taking in turns with friends.

A score board so you know whos better.

Now with a VS mode, 2 player can drop in or drop out at almost any time.

a unique indie style of its own.

Visit Camp Aign on the search for The Main Thingy and collect more Thingys.

Find items like the Upgraded shirt to improve your jumping and score or other items to do other stuff.

No tutorials, very little reading, lots of action.

Over 25 minutes of original music to discover.

Compatible with touch screen devices.

The first game ever made by Steves Games.

Created using Construct
name: Jumping Steve

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 6800h (lowest tested so far)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea Geforce RTX 3060 laptop GPU (lowest tested so far)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: most standards
  • VR Support: n/a
  • Additional Notes: This game has not been tested on many different systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 6800h
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea Geforce RTX 3060 laptop GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: most standards
  • VR Support: n/a
  • Additional Notes: This game has not been tested on many different systems

short_description: Jumping Steve is a 2d arcade style indy casual roguelike game. Stay on the crows. Collect the thingys to increase your score so you can unlock stuff. MOD machine randomness. With over 2 Achievements. Power ups. 2 player. Lots of items. Visit Camp Aign. Not compatible with the gameboy camera.
